item.title: Updated Modern Code Generation for WinForm's InitializeComponent - .NET Blog
item.description: When you design a WinForms Form, it gets generated into a method called InitializeComponent. When you reopen that Form, it gets recreated by interpreting that code. In Visual Studio 2022 17.5, we've modernized the code generation process. And made some changes.
